casebody.data:
Jackson, ex dem. Rachael Lewis and others, v. John Van Loon. WOODWORTH moved for a commission tobe directed to persons in this state, to take the examination of witnesses in Pennsylvania. *461 Riggs

against its being allowed, urged the direction.

Per Curiam.

The act* does not specify, that the commissioners should live in the state to which the commission is addressed.

Take your motion.

For the amendment of the law, 1 Rev. Laws, 351. sec. 11.
